verses.text_plain: The elder to the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth.
verses.verse_html: 1 aThe elder to the beloved Gaius, bwhom I love in truth.

verses.text_plain: Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.
verses.verse_html: 2Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.

verses.text_plain: For I rejoiced greatly when the brothers came and testified to your truth, as indeed you are walking in the truth.
verses.verse_html:
3For cI rejoiced greatly when the brothers ▼
▼Or  brothers and sisters. The plural Greek word adelphoi (translated “brothers”) refers to siblings in a family. In New Testament usage, depending on the context, adelphoi may refer either to men or to both men and women who are siblings (brothers and sisters) in God’s family, the church; also verses 5, 10
 came and testified to your truth, as indeed you are walking in the truth.

footnotes.body_text: ▼Or brothers and sisters. The plural Greek word adelphoi (translated “brothers”) refers to siblings in a family. In New Testament usage, depending on the context, adelphoi may refer either to men or to both men and women who are siblings (brothers and sisters) in God’s family, the church; also verses 5, 10
footnotes.body_html: ▼Or  brothers and sisters. The plural Greek word adelphoi (translated “brothers”) refers to siblings in a family. In New Testament usage, depending on the context, adelphoi may refer either to men or to both men and women who are siblings (brothers and sisters) in God’s family, the church; also verses 5, 10

verses.text_plain: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.
verses.verse_html: 4I have no greater joy than to hear that emy children are walking in the truth.

verses.text_plain: Beloved, it is a faithful thing you do in all your efforts for these brothers, strangers as they are,
verses.verse_html: 5Beloved, it is a faithful thing you do in all your efforts for fthese brothers, gstrangers as they are,

verses.text_plain: who testified to your love before the church. You will do well to send them on their journey in a manner worthy of God.
verses.verse_html: 6who testified to your love before the church. You will do well to send them on their journey in a manner hworthy of God.

verses.text_plain: For they have gone out for the sake of the name, accepting nothing from the Gentiles.
verses.verse_html: 7For they have gone out for the sake of ithe name, jaccepting nothing from the Gentiles.

verses.text_plain: Therefore we ought to support people like these, that we may be fellow workers for the truth.
verses.verse_html: 8Therefore we ought to support people like these, that we may be fellow workers for the truth.

verses.text_plain: I have written something to the church, but Diotrephes, who likes to put himself first, does not acknowledge our authority.
verses.verse_html: 9I have written something to the church, but Diotrephes, who likes to put himself first, does not acknowledge our authority.

verses.text_plain: So if I come, I will bring up what he is doing, talking wicked nonsense against us. And not content with that, he refuses to welcome the brothers, and also stops those who want to and puts them out of the church.
verses.verse_html: 10So if I come, I will bring up what he is doing, talking wicked nonsense against us. And not content with that, he refuses to welcome the brothers, and also stops those who want to and puts them out of the church.

verses.text_plain: Beloved, do not imitate evil but imitate good. Whoever does good is from God; whoever does evil has not seen God.
verses.verse_html: 11Beloved, kdo not imitate evil but imitate good. lWhoever does good is from God; mwhoever does evil has not seen God.

verses.text_plain: Demetrius has received a good testimony from everyone, and from the truth itself. We also add our testimony, and you know that our testimony is true.
verses.verse_html: 12Demetrius nhas received a good testimony from everyone, and from the truth itself. We also add our testimony, and oyou know that our testimony is true.

verses.text_plain: I had much to write to you, but I would rather not write with pen and ink.
verses.verse_html: 13 pI had much to write to you, but I would rather not write with pen and ink.

verses.text_plain: I hope to see you soon, and we will talk face to face.
verses.verse_html: 14I hope to see you soon, and we will talk face to face.

verses.text_plain: Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends, each by name.
verses.verse_html: 15Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends, qeach by name.
